commit.message: removed braces from single variable lambdas

nodes.bodyText: I think i liked the multi-line version here - it's too long to easily read.
Ditto here (although the line below is also stupidly long).
Is the stream redundant here given forEach is used right after? I noticed this all throughout this PR - would you mind searching for instances of stream().forEach(...) and correcting that?
Could you expand the single character variable names here?
